name: Simple Platforms
description:
A passion project that I worked on a year ago, I haven't found motivation to work on it more but maybe showing people will help with the grind. It's planned to be a short, sweet platformer game with nothing groundbreaking. All of the voice lines are done by my friend DandKGames. This was mainly inspired by There is no Game and I wanted to create something like that, but a platformer. This is also my first project. All music and textures are made by me.

HTML5 version available on Newgrounds.

If you want older versions of the game you'll have to go to my website here: http://dewachen.mynetgear.com/simple-platforms/

Update 0.2.6 5/27/21: Added level 6, Changed the character's collision box, Added background music, Added better lighting

Currently fixing a bug in the newgrounds version where the voice lines in level 4 play all at once in the beginning.
